name: Cube Boy: Adventure
description:
Retro puzzle platfomer adventure game.

Cube Boy : Adventure is a retro platform game with puzzle elements. You play as Cube Boy who tries to escape from a dungeon, with many obstacles, and save other Cube Boy in the dungeon. there are many dungeon levels. which gets more difficult, lots of obstacles and puzzles with each level increase.

LETS PLAY!!!  To helps Cube Boy pass through obstacles, and solve existing puzzles.

FEATURES:

- Old school platformer gameplay.

- Unique levels.

- More Puzzle.

- More Obstacle
